CustomField.description: Returns true for accounts that need the owner changed to an active user on the team fitting the account's status and region.
CustomField.formula: if( Owner.IsActive = false || Suggested_Owner_Team__c != TEXT( Owner.Team__c ), true, false)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Returns true for accounts that need the owner changed to an active user on the team fitting the account's status and region
CustomField.label: Needs Reassignment
